questions.text: Who was in denial about Sam and Diane's engagement?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Every time someone tried to mention the engagement Carla would totally talk about something unrelated. Everyone tried to get her to accept that they were engaged.

questions.text: What did Sam say the ring Diane wanted cost?
questions.explanation:
$5,200.

	Sam didn't have the money to buy the ring Diane wanted. Norm said he had a friend who could get him the same ring at a good deal.

questions.text: When Norm told Carla that Diane would be her boss when Sam and Diane got married, how did she respond?
questions.correct: Nice shirt Norm, Is it new?
options: When I marry Cliff she'll be my boss.
questions.explanation:
Nice shirt Norm, Is it new?.

	This continued to show that she is in denial. She can't handle the idea of Sam marrying Diane so she simply refused to accept it.

questions.correct: the box the engagement ring came in
questions.explanation:
the box the engagement ring came in.

	Diane said that every woman wanted the box her engagement ring came in. Sam ended up buying some corn on the cob holders to get a box.

questions.text: What did Sam buy for Diane to keep her from going to the store where the ring she wanted was?
questions.explanation:
3 dresses.

	Diane said she wanted to get the pink dress. Sam bought all three dresses because every dress in the window at the shop was pink.

questions.text: Who did Carla say agreed to marry Sam?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	Diane asked Carla "Who was the lovely woman that has agreed to marry Sam". Carla answered "Norm" which caused everyone to see just how bad her denial state was.

questions.text: Why did Sam say he was late getting back?
questions.correct: He got a parking ticket and wanted to fight it in court.
options: He got sick and went to the hospital.
He couldn't decide which dress to buy.
questions.explanation:
He got a parking ticket and wanted to fight it in court.

	Sam had told Diane that he already bought the dress and it was in his car. However, he had to go to the store to buy the dresses so it took him a while to get back.

questions.text: Why did Diane say she had to go to the store?
options: to buy another dress since Sam didn't buy the right one
to see if she wanted anything else for Sam to buy her
questions.explanation:
to get the ring appraised.

	Sam thought he was in the clear until she mentioned getting the ring appraised. He  knew that if Diane went she'd find out the ring was a fake.

questions.text: Did Sam end up buying the real ring?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	Sam said he was not going to buy the ring. Norm and Cliff said the ring was bought (meaning Sam was going to buy it).

questions.text: Did Diane find out about the fake ring?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	When she found out about the ring being fake she took it off her finger and threw it down a sewer. Sam then informed her that he switched the fake ring for the real ring. He then told her all the money he spent on a ring that he no longer had. She said she'd rather have the fake ring since that's the one he bought first and they  made up.
